snippet: A suicide bomber killed 15 people as they left a Shiite mosque in Baghdad on Friday and a separate attack on Sunni protesters killed 7 others, the authorities said.
abstract: Suicide bomber kills 15 Shiites as they leave Baghdad mosque and separate attack on Sunni protesters kills 7 others in Samarra, where Sunnis have been protesting against Shiite-led Iraqi government.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber killed 15 people as they left a Shiite mosque in Baghdad on Friday and a separate attack on Sunni protesters killed 7 others, the authorities said.

headline.main: Iraq: Attacks Kill Shiites and Sunnis
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Attacks Kill Shiites and Sunnis
